Subject Background:
The Graduate Record Examination (GRE) and Graduate Management Admission Test (GMAT) both include sections on math. These exams are commonly taken by individuals seeking admission to graduate school or business school. The math sections of these exams cover a wide range of topics, including algebra, geometry, statistics, and data analysis.
